channel.title: ::playerlist for 667/7**

item.title: ::playerlist for 667/7**
item.dc:creator: @The_Real_Asian The Real Asian
item.description:
@The_Real_Asian wrote:

i need help getting the 667/7** playerlist command. i get 15 compiling errors. heres the command. ( i transferred this from my 614/634 server.) (EDIT: I DID MORE CODING INTO IT AND MADE THIS 1) } if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("playerlist")) { player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275); for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++){ player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " "); } World.getPlayers().size(); { String Packets = ""; player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Will"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, "<col=FF0000><shad=000000><img=4>Owner</col></shad>"); } if (player.getRights() == 2) { player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 18, "<img=1><col=FFFF00>Administrator</col>"); } if (player.getRights() == 1) { player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 19, "<img=0><col=FFFFFF>Moderator</col>"); } player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275,2, "BlazePk Players Online: "+World.getPlayers().size()+""); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "<u>Players Online: "+World.getPlayers().size()+"</u>"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "Current Online Players:"+World.getPlayers().size()); }

and now that i have this. the component text doesnt show the name or after a title

Read full topic
